OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD HALLAM LESBIAN, GAY, BI-SEXUAL AND TRANSGENDER SOCIETY

Desc.entry: Offers one-to-one support, information and advice and provides a safe alternative space for lesbian, gay, bi-sexual and transgender (LGBT) students. Also organises social activities and campaigns. Open to current Sheffield Hallam University students only.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Meeting times, please contact for details
